reviews.productTitle: LANBON LCD 1/2/3 Gang Smart Light Switch,2.4G Wi-Fi Touch Smart Switch Works with Alexa/Google Home,Wireless 3 Way,WiFi Mesh 5-in-1 Wall Magic Panel No Offline,Neutral Wire Required,NO Dim,L8-HS-White
reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching LCD touchscreen styled switches and eventually took a chance on this one based on the appearance and a video review from someone in the UK. I have to say that I really like the overall functionality of these switches. It has great touch response and so far after nearly a year of being installed, has had no issues with that aspect of it. It's easy to wire and install and initial setup to get this thing running is fast as well. I really like the interface lighting and customization. I did try 2 other touch-screen style switches to compare later, and they've been disappointing compared to this one. My ONLY grip with this switch is the WiFi part. It seems to lose it's functionality with WiFi and re-connecting sometimes requires a reboot of the switch. The initial WiFi connection process is fast and easy, but once it drops, it's more of a challenge to reconnect. And while being able to control my lights via an app can be appealing and appeases my sometimes laziness not to want to get off the couch, it was not my primary reason for the purchase. Personally, the WiFi feature is more of an added bonus for me, so not functioning properly only dropped my review down 1 star. I can't speak to the customer service either since I rarely engage those anymore with anything... I think we've normalized poor customer service with just about everything these days, so can't base my rating on that either. Overall it's a great upgrade from standard toggle switches and can give your house a more modern look in my opinion.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2025
reviews.title: Great look, feel, and function but WiFi connectivity needs fixing
variationList: Style: L8-HS 1/2/3 Gang Light Switch White

reviews.text: I was remodeling one wall with shiplap that had one 3gang and one 2gang switched. Wanted to update and clean up the appearance of out 35 year old wiring. Install was simple. After the wife saw it installed, all the the switch sets in the hall, split entry and basement entrances were next on the agenda. The 7 switch sets had had 8 2-way or 3-way switched. With the ability to link mutual switches to a circuit really was slick. All in stalled in one day. The only issue was finding updated switch plates to place over the 2-gang and 3-gang boxes to mount the one l8 controllers. I'm pretty handy. altered box planks or the old wood plate covers. Looks good to me. (The wife too!. Very important! ) Bathroom and walk-in closet will be next. Really had no issues yet...

reviews.title: Impressive - Easy Update to Automation.

reviews.productTitle: LANBON LCD 1/2/3 Gang Smart Light Switch,2.4G Wi-Fi Touch Smart Switch Works with Alexa/Google Home,Wireless 3 Way,WiFi Mesh 5-in-1 Wall Magic Panel No Offline,Neutral Wire Required,NO Dim,L8-HS-White
reviews.text: First off I have tried a few different types of smart switches and this one is great. Nice touch screen functionality and customization is easy. NOTE: this switch does require a neutral wire, but does not require a hub and also is a mesh WiFi booster and integrated well with my eero WiFi mesh system. Controllability is great you can control with the app or via Amazon Alexa/ google voice assistant. Installing it was easy and setup was not hard. The overall look is really nice and creates a modern look for o your home with a sleek profile. Currently have these setup in my garage and will be adding a neutral wire to my house switch boxes and converting my whole house to these switches they are one of the best I have found and very dependable. You can control them manually so no need to worry about problems with internet connection, if your internet drops due to unexpected problems with your provider you can still control these manually like a normal switch. In conclusion I highly recommend these 1 great look 2 easy install 3 seamless smart home integration 4 great price 5 WiFi mesh capable.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.title: One of the best smart switches I have tried!!
variationList: Style: L8-HS 1/2/3 Gang Light Switch White

reviews.productTitle: LANBON LCD 1/2/3 Gang Smart Light Switch,2.4G Wi-Fi Touch Smart Switch Works with Alexa/Google Home,Wireless 3 Way,WiFi Mesh 5-in-1 Wall Magic Panel No Offline,Neutral Wire Required,NO Dim,L8-HS-White
reviews.text: Update: bought a second one(should have bought the Touya version, the smart living really sucks), for I actually found it works and looks the way I wanted, and fun to change the buttons. Using a blank box cover may feel like it is “attach”ing to the wall plate, but in the meantime before I figure out a better solution, it does the job cover the wires in the wall behind. See attached picture. It’s easy to install and saves the clutter in the box by using I switch controlling up to 3, but that’ where the little issue comes from, I am using it to replace a two gang switch, but the whole thing is only little wider than a single smart switch, so there would be a big ugly hole with tangled wires inside next to the led screen, I had to buy a two gang switch cover blank, cut a hole in the middle to let the back of this switch goes thru. It does work, just bit awkward. I would suggest they make a custom cover for 2 & 3 gang, also slime down the switch dimension so it would fit the standard single switch box. Some of the other room for improvement is there app, need to fix the errors that popping up here and there. Like error linking to Amazon. Otherwise, it would’ve been a five star product.

reviews.title: I want to give it a 5 star
